life.threedee.game

Class Consumable

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.game.Consumable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapFeature, Tickable, ThreeDeeObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Energizer, Pellet, SpecialPointsConsumable

    public abstract class Consumable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreeDeeObject, Tickable, MapFeature
    A consumable in the game. A consumable is anything that is stationary, can be consumed during the play of the game, and is usually constructed out of several, similarly generated triangles. Also, they usually rotate.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Point center
      The center and location of this consumable.
      protected boolean eaten
      Whether this consumable has been eaten, and must therefore be displayed.
      protected Point[] p
      The points which can be constructed in a generic manner.
      protected Triangle[] t
      The triangles which make up this consumable.
      protected double yaw
      The current yaw of the forwards vector of this consumable.

      Consumable(Point center, int t, int p, double a_inc)
      Construct a consumable with a given center, angle incrementer, and a given amount of standard triangles and points.

    • Field Detail

      • t

        protected Triangle[] t
        The triangles which make up this consumable.

      • p

        protected Point[] p
        The points which can be constructed in a generic manner. Point which are different from most of the points are not in this array.

      • center

        protected Point center
        The center and location of this consumable.

      • yaw

        protected double yaw
        The current yaw of the forwards vector of this consumable. This is used for rotation.

      • eaten

        protected boolean eaten
        Whether this consumable has been eaten, and must therefore be displayed.

      • Consumable

        public Consumable(Point center,
          int t,
          int p,
          double a_inc)
        Construct a consumable with a given center, angle incrementer, and a given amount of standard triangles and points.
        Parameters:
        center - The center of this consumable.
        t - The amount of standard triangles in this consumable.
        p - The amount of standard points in this consumable.
        a_inc - The angle incrementer.
